証取法: (しょうとりほう) - Securities and Exchange Act
証憑: (しょうひょう) - documented evidence (contract, voucher, etc.)
証拠がため: (しょうこがため) - gathering evidence; collecting evidence
証拠だてる: (しょうこだてる) - to prove; to substantiate
証拠をつかむ: (しょうこをつかむ) - to obtain evidence
証拠を押さえる: (しょうこをおさえる) - to seize (secure) evidence
証拠を掴む: (しょうこをつかむ) - to obtain evidence
証拠品: (しょうこひん) - piece of evidence; evidence
証拠固め: (しょうこがため) - gathering evidence; collecting evidence
証拠書類: (しょうこしょるい) - documentary evidence; documentation
証拠物件: (しょうこぶっけん) - evidence; an exhibit
証拠立てる: (しょうこだてる) - to prove; to substantiate
証拠金: (しょうこきん) - deposit (e.g. on the purchase of a house)/earnest money/guarantee money; margin (payment)/warrant money/cover
証拠隠滅: (しょうこいんめつ) - (yoji) destruction of evidence
証文の出し後れ: (しょうもんのだしおくれ) - It is too late to make an apology
証明した写し: (しょうめいしたうつし) - certified true copy (of documents)
証明写真: (しょうめいしゃしん) - photograph for passports, ID cards, etc. (usu. 4x3cm)
証明書: (しょうめいしょ) - certificate (usually of proof of something); credentials
証明権限者: (しょうめいけんげんしゃ) - certifying authority
証明機関: (しょうめいきかん) - certification authority
証明証: (しょうめいしょう) - user certificate; certificate
証明証経路: (しょうめいしょうけいろ) - certification path
証明証通し番号: (しょうめいしょうとおしばんごう) - certificate serial number
証明謄本: (しょうめいとうほん) - attested copy
証明責任: (しょうめいせきにん) - {law}  burden of proof
証票: (しょうひょう) - certificate; voucher; chit
証言台: (しょうげんだい) - witness stand; witness box
証言録取: (しょうげんろくしゅ) - deposition; record of testimony
詐り: (いつわり) - lie; falsehood; fiction; fabrication
詐る: (いつわる) - to lie; to cheat; to falsify; to deceive; to pretend
詐欺: (sagi) - fraude, trapaça, corrupção, engano, truque, golpe
詔勅: (しょうちょく) - imperial edict; decree
評す: (ひょうす) - to evaluate; to appraise; to comment on
評する: (ひょうする) - to evaluate; to appraise; to comment on
評価: (hyouka) - avaliação, estimativa, parecer, valoração, classificação; valorizar, avaliar, classificar, estimar o valor, avaliação, estimativa, parecer, valoração, classificação; valorizar, avaliar, classificar, estimar o valor; apreciar, valorizar muito, reconhecer o valor (de algo)
評価の尺度: (ひょうかのしゃくど) - evaluation measure
評価基準: (ひょうかきじゅん) - valuation basis; appraisal standard
評価報告書: (ひょうかほうこくしょ) - evaluation report
評価式: (ひょうかしき) - evaluation formula; valuation plan
評価引当金: (ひょうかひきあてきん) - valuation allowance
評価損: (ひょうかそん) - paper loss; appraisal loss; loss resulting from revised valuation
評価益: (ひょうかえき) - paper profit; appraisal gain; profit accrued from revised valuation
評価額: (ひょうかかく) - estimated value; appraised value; appraisement
評判どおり: (ひょうばんどおり) - the same as something was reputed to be
評判になる: (ひょうばんになる) - to be talked about; to get a name for oneself; to get publicity
評判記: (ひょうばんき) - written commentary on notable events or persons
評判通り: (ひょうばんどおり) - the same as something was reputed to be
評定: (ひょうてい) - assessment; rating; grade; evaluation
評定水準: (ひょうていすいじゅん) - rating level
評注: (ひょうちゅう) - commentary; notes and comments
評点: (ひょうてん) - (examination) comments and marks; rating
評論家: (ひょうろんか) - critic; reviewer; commentator
評議会: (ひょうぎかい) - council; board of trustees
詛う: (のろう) - to curse; to put a curse on; to detest intensely
詞: (shi) - poetry , words, writing, lyrics; ci (forma de poesia chinesa); independent word
詞書: (ことばがき) - foreword to a collection of poems; preface; explanatory notes; captions
詞書き: (ことばがき) - foreword to a collection of poems; preface; explanatory notes; captions
